title: KLM - Royal Dutch Airlines
summary: The new and improved KLM app is ready to deliver what you need, when you need it
description: The new and vastly improved KLM app is ready to deliver what you need, when you need it. With features like one-tap check-in, effortless seat changes, and handy destination information, you’re always one step ahead on your journey.  CHECK FLYING BLUE MILES: Check and manage your Flying Blue status, Miles and benefits instantly.CHECK IN FOR FLIGHTS: Breeze through check-in with a single tap and always have your boarding pass at hand.CHANGE SEATS: Whether it’s window or aisle, you effortlessly change your seat. Feel like stretching your legs? Our new app suggests the best deals for extra comfort. ADD BAGGAGE: The new KLM app lets you add baggage faster than you can pack. FLIGHT UPDATES: Take your eyes off the departure screens, sit back and relax. We’ll keep you up to speed with the latest updates on your journey.TRAVEL INSPIRATION: Discover the world through inspiring articles on your Android tablet. Select your favourite themes to find your next journey of inspiration.BOOK A TRIP: You pick the destination; we take care of the rest. Choose the best flight, date and fare type, and book straight from the app.  ONE-TAP PAYMENT: Save your credit card details so you can book flights, add baggage or choose more comfort with your wallet out of sight.
descriptionHTML:
The new and vastly improved KLM app is ready to deliver what you need, when you need it. With features like one-tap check-in, effortless seat changes, and handy destination information, you’re always one step ahead on your journey.
  
CHECK FLYING BLUE MILES: Check and manage your Flying Blue status, Miles and benefits instantly.

CHECK IN FOR FLIGHTS: Breeze through check-in with a single tap and always have your boarding pass at hand.

CHANGE SEATS: Whether it’s window or aisle, you effortlessly change your seat. Feel like stretching your legs? Our new app suggests the best deals for extra comfort.
 
ADD BAGGAGE: The new KLM app lets you add baggage faster than you can pack.
 
FLIGHT UPDATES: Take your eyes off the departure screens, sit back and relax. We’ll keep you up to speed with the latest updates on your journey.

TRAVEL INSPIRATION: Discover the world through inspiring articles on your Android tablet. Select your favourite themes to find your next journey of inspiration.

BOOK A TRIP: You pick the destination; we take care of the rest. Choose the best flight, date and fare type, and book straight from the app.
  
ONE-TAP PAYMENT: Save your credit card details so you can book flights, add baggage or choose more comfort with your wallet out of sight.
comments: So far... A useless App for adding and paying for excess baggage. I am guessing, it is the same for moving flight dates. Shame really. I was hoping the App would be convenient and reliable.

Terrible app. Looks good but a lot of critical things don't work. I couldn't check in cos the 'issue date' calendar only goes past 1970. Can't select seats. Airports are missing from flight status area.  Cant see recent transactions. You'd be left disappointed with the app.

Terrible app, nothing appears to work. Unable to add passport details to profile.  Unable to click the link presented to add passport details during check in. Utterly pointless why did they even bother

Unable to check-in as the link to add passport details did not work.  Tried to add passport to profile only to receive an application error. Under the circumstances, I think that my two stars are generous.
Works well to check-in but it disappointed me in an important case. KLM rescheduled my flight but the app was showing the original departure date ... It didn't synchronise and mislead me.
recentChanges: Aren't sure when you want to go, but are afraid our amazing offer will be gone soon? Claim your price now and pay later!
